channel.title: defjaf tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from defjaf.

item.description: I guess the postwar period really is over.
item.source:markdown: I guess the postwar period really is over.

item.description: I first got obsessed with The Paranoid Style when I briefly mistook their “That Guy’s in Rammstein” for a hoped-for new song with vocals by glorious Mekon Sally Timms. I was wrong, and happy but unsurprised to know @paranoiacs share my longstanding love for the Mekons. https://t.co/WGRFTUi7ZV
item.source:markdown: I first got obsessed with The Paranoid Style when I briefly mistook their “That Guy’s in Rammstein” for a hoped-for new song with vocals by glorious Mekon Sally Timms. I was wrong, and happy but unsurprised to know @paranoiacs share my longstanding love for the Mekons. https://t.co/WGRFTUi7ZV

item.description: @jr_pritchard “Keep calm and carry on” would have been a more appropriate tribute.
item.source:markdown: @jr_pritchard “Keep calm and carry on” would have been a more appropriate tribute.

item.description: @ShellFishApp Happens all the time — I’ve never got a tmux session working in shellfish. That is, tmux works if I invoke it myself from a normal terminal, but I can’t get shellfish terminal persistence working.
item.source:markdown: @ShellFishApp Happens all the time — I’ve never got a tmux session working in shellfish. That is, tmux works if I invoke it myself from a normal terminal, but I can’t get shellfish terminal persistence working.

item.description: @ShellFishApp Having trouble with tmux on shellfish: variously get messages “no server running on /private/tmp/tmux-501/default” and occasionally “unknown command: is” when trying to display sessions. Former seems to depend on status of tmux server and sessions started in other terminals.
item.source:markdown: @ShellFishApp Having trouble with tmux on shellfish: variously get messages “no server running on /private/tmp/tmux-501/default” and occasionally “unknown command: is” when trying to display sessions. Former seems to depend on status of tmux server and sessions started in other terminals.

item.description: @malcfairbairn She has staff to help with that.
item.source:markdown: @malcfairbairn She has staff to help with that.

item.description:
@malcfairbairn @R_Trotta In fact they both ran unopposed so arguably less democratic. The appropriate thing is to call an election but there is no requirement, and neither did so immediately.

@malcfairbairn @R_Trotta … and Truss surely won’t.
item.source:markdown:
@malcfairbairn @R_Trotta In fact they both ran unopposed so arguably less democratic. The appropriate thing is to call an election but there is no requirement, and neither did so immediately.
@malcfairbairn @R_Trotta … and Truss surely won’t.

item.description: @cosmonist @thiagosgbr @AlkistisPou @AstroRoyalScot @thaisa_sb @telescoper @AlanHeavens @apontzen @AstroKatie This isn’t a problem only in academia (much less physics or astrophysics); is there any prior art out there? But the general issue of how to assess these skills (and to root out particularly bad actors) is worthy of thought.
item.source:markdown: @cosmonist @thiagosgbr @AlkistisPou @AstroRoyalScot @thaisa_sb @telescoper @AlanHeavens @apontzen @AstroKatie This isn’t a problem only in academia (much less physics or astrophysics); is there any prior art out there? But the general issue of how to assess these skills (and to root out particularly bad actors) is worthy of thought.

item.description: @AlanHeavens Are you recreating a tube car in your sitting room?
item.source:markdown: @AlanHeavens Are you recreating a tube car in your sitting room?

item.description: @playingwithdust So sorry, Brian. Thinking of you.
item.source:markdown: @playingwithdust So sorry, Brian. Thinking of you.
